entry.title: Welcome, Jordan!
entry.content: Jordan Perez will work with us on her honors project. She will study how animal’s health depends on phosphoglycerate dehydrogenase function. Have fun!
entry.summary: Jordan Perez will work with us on her honors project. She will study how animal’s health depends on phosphoglycerate dehydrogenase function. Have fun!
